workflow.name: Flight deal analyzer with weather data using GPT, Google Flights & WordPress
workflow.description:
## Introduction
Automates flight deal discovery and intelligent analysis for travel bloggers and deal hunters. Scrapes live pricing, enriches with weather data, applies AI evaluation, and auto-publishes to WordPress‚Äîeliminating manual research and accelerating content delivery.

## How It Works
User submits route via form, scrapes real-time flight prices and weather data, AI analyzes deal quality considering weather conditions, formats results, publishes to WordPress, sends Slack notification‚Äîfully automated from input to publication.

## Workflow Template
Form Input ‚Üí Extract Data ‚Üí Scrape Flight Prices ‚Üí Extract Pricing ‚Üí Fetch Weather ‚Üí Parse Weather ‚Üí Prepare AI Input ‚Üí AI Analysis ‚Üí Parse Output ‚Üí Format Results ‚Üí Publish WordPress ‚Üí Slack Alert ‚Üí User Response

## Setup Instructions
1. **Form Setup:** Configure user input fields for flight routes and preferences
2. **APIs:** Connect Google Flights scraping endpoint, weather API credentials, OpenAI/Chat Model API key
3. **Publishing:** Set WordPress credentials, target blog category, Slack webhook URL
4. **AI Configuration:** Define analysis prompts, output structure, parser rules

## Workflow Steps
1. **Data Collection:** Form captures route, scrapes Google Flights pricing, fetches destination weather via API
2. **AI Processing:** Enriches flight data with weather context, analyzes deal quality using OpenAI/Chat Model with structured output parsing
3. **Publishing:** Formats analysis results, creates WordPress post, sends Slack notification, delivers response to user


## Prerequisites
n8n instance, Google Flights access, weather API key, OpenAI/compatible AI service, WordPress site with API access, Slack workspace

## Use Cases
Travel blog automation, flight deal newsletters, price comparison services, seasonal travel planning, destination weather analysis, automated social media content

## Customization
Modify AI analysis criteria, adjust weather impact weighting, customize WordPress post templates, add email distribution, integrate additional data sources, expand to hotel/rental deals

## Benefits
Eliminates manual price checking, combines multiple data sources automatically, delivers AI-enhanced insights, accelerates publishing workflow, scales across unlimited routes, provides weather-aware recommendations

workflow.name: GPT-Realtime Flight Deal Analyzer: Auto-Scrape, Evaluate & Publish to WordPress

parameters.formDescription: Enter your travel preferences to find the cheapest flights to Japan

assignments.name: userPreferences
assignments.value: =Departure: {{ $('Extract Form Data').item.json.departureCity }}, Month: {{ $('Extract Form Data').item.json.preferredMonth }}, Budget: ${{ $('Extract Form Data').item.json.maxBudget }}, Flexible: {{ $('Extract Form Data').item.json.flexibleDates }}

parameters.text:
=You are a travel data analyst specializing in flight pricing and weather-based travel planning.

Analyze the following flight data, user preferences, and real-time weather forecasts to identify:
1. The cheapest available flight options to Japan (Tokyo, Osaka, Sapporo)
2. Optimal travel periods based on price trends AND weather conditions
3. Whether the user's budget is realistic
4. Weather-based recommendations for activities and packing
5. Best booking strategies considering seasonal weather patterns

Combined Data:
{{ $json.combinedData }}

Provide a comprehensive analysis with:
- Cheapest flights found (price, dates, airline)
- Recommended travel periods with weather insights
- Budget analysis
- Weather-appropriate travel tips
- Seasonal activity recommendations
- Alternative airports or routes if beneficial

options.systemMessage: You are an expert travel analyst. Provide clear, actionable insights about flight prices and travel recommendations.

parameters.title: =Best Time to Visit Japan - {{ $('Extract Form Data').item.json.preferredMonth }} Analysis

parameters.responseBody:
=‚úÖ Your Japan flight analysis with weather forecast is complete!

*Current Weather Conditions:*
Tokyo: {{ $('Parse Weather Data').item.json.tokyoWeather.temperature_2m }}¬∞C
Osaka: {{ $('Parse Weather Data').item.json.osakaWeather.temperature_2m }}¬∞C
Sapporo: {{ $('Parse Weather Data').item.json.sapporoWeather.temperature_2m }}¬∞C

*Flight & Travel Analysis:*
{{ $json.aiAnalysis }}

We've also:
- Posted the detailed analysis with weather insights to our blog
- Sent a summary to our Slack channel

Thank you for using our service!

assignments.name: combinedData

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.
